content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Workgroups handle (fulfill and resolve) Service Requests using the \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.epam.com/esp/index.do\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SERVICE OPERATOR INTERFACE\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Request Fulfillment process starts when a Service Request is created from the Interaction submitted by a Requestor via the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.epam.com/esp/ess.do\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Self-Service Portal\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" or using the Service Desk (instant messages, phone or email) and approved by the authorities.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Once a Service Request is logged, the Service Request Coordinator reviews, accepts it and creates one or several Tasks to fulfill the Service Request. The Service Request Coordinator can decline and return it back to the Service Desk for further categorization specifying the return reasons.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/49df0186-4414-4c14-9c8c-5fdcb22b31a5/SR_workfl.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":867,\"height\":530}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The core of the Service Request fulfillment is creation and execution of related Tasks. All Tasks must be assigned to Operators of the Workgroup for processing. After all Tasks are fulfilled, the Service Request is to be validated whether it is resolved by the Service Request Coordinator. If no further actions required, the Service Request becomes resolved.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Requestors are notified after the Service Request is resolved. They can manually close their related Interaction by providing a feedback and rating the resolution. Otherwise, the system closes the Interaction automatically after a five-day period if there is no action taken from the Requestor. Finally, after the initial Interaction is closed, the linked Service Request becomes closed.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Service Requests are tracked from the beginning to the end to ensure compliance with the delivery time. They are divided into three categories that differ in their workflows and the way the Tasks are created:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/617091c3-a533-49d2-beb8-59b366ba78ac/Category_SR.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":554,\"height\":275}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Service Request workflow has some basic steps. However, depending on the category a particular Service Request belongs to, the processing workflow can vary.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"MORE DETAILS\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/kqD0E\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Request Fulfillment Process documentation\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
